text: Simona Halep was the defending champion, but chose not to participate this year. Anna Karolína Schmiedlová won the title, defeating Sara Errani in the final, 7–6(7–3), 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Draw=== ====First Qualifier==== ====Second Qualifier==== ====Third Qualifier==== ====Fourth Qualifier==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw BRD Bucharest Openandnbsp;- Singles 2015 Singles
title: 2015 BRD Bucharest Open – Singles
